epic.title: SKOREQ OBS Dream Collection
epic.description: Industry-shattering OBS scene collection integrating 8K Theater, AI plugins, NDI widgets, and NovaXe pedagogical system

stories.title: NDI Widget Bridge Infrastructure
stories.description: Create NDI output wrapper for 8K Theater widgets (Piano, Fretboard, Braid, COF, HarmonicProfile, ScoreTab, Metronome, TempoGeometry). Configure DistroAV/NDI Tools for Linux, establish naming convention, test latency with KRONOS sync.
acceptanceCriteria: Each 8K Theater widget visible as independent NDI source in OBS source list
Alpha channel preserved for transparency compositing
Measured latency < 50ms from MIDI input to visual update in NDI stream
NDI sources auto-discoverable via DistroAV NDI scanner on 192.168.x.x subnet
NDI_WIDGET_ARCHITECTURE.md document exists with configuration instructions

stories.title: AI Plugin Configuration
stories.description: Configure LocalVocal with music-optimized Whisper model (medium.en), set up Background Removal with studio lighting profile, create Advanced Scene Switcher macros, configure CleanStream for verbal tic removal.
acceptanceCriteria: LocalVocal producing captions with measured latency < 2000ms
Background removal functional without physical green screen in standard office lighting
At least 10 Advanced Scene Switcher macros created for common lesson transitions
CleanStream configured for 'um/uh/like' removal at default sensitivity
AI_PLUGIN_CONFIGURATION.md exists with troubleshooting section

stories.title: obs-mcp ROXY Integration
stories.description: Upgrade ROXY MCP server with full OBS WebSocket 5.x API coverage. Add voice command intents for scene switching, source visibility toggles, filter triggers, and hotword detection for hands-free control.
acceptanceCriteria: Voice command 'Hey ROXY, switch to scale scene' triggers SetCurrentProgramScene
Voice commands 'Show the braid' / 'Hide the braid' toggle source visibility
Voice commands 'Start recording' / 'Stop streaming' functional via WebSocket
Filter trigger commands working ('Animate key shift up')
ROXY_OBS_VOICE_CONTROL.md documents all 20+ voice commands

progress.documentation: PARTIAL - docs exist but need update

stories.title: Scene Collection Architecture
stories.description: Create scene hierarchy reducing Harry_Elgato 238 scenes to ~80 modular scenes. Implement emoji naming convention, build nested scenes for reusability, create groups for toggle states, migrate move_source_filters.
acceptanceCriteria: Total scene count in SKOREQ_Dream.json <= 85
All 12 pedagogical features from Harry_Elgato preserved (key shift, scale overlay, COF, braid, etc.)
Emoji naming convention applied to 100% of scenes
At least 3 nested scenes created (fretboard, braid, COF)
102 move_source_filters migrated and functional
Source count reduction >= 60% compared to Harry_Elgato

progress.emojiNaming: DONE - All 73 scenes with category prefixes
progress.filterMigration: DONE - 1813 move filters extracted to reference file

stories.title: Horizontal Canvas Master Scenes
stories.description: Create 8 master scenes optimized for horizontal streaming (YouTube/Twitch) at 2560x1440. Configure source arrangements, transition animations, hotkey map F1-F8.
acceptanceCriteria: 8 master scenes exist: Full Theory, Scale Lesson, Chord Study, Circle Study, Performance, Song Analysis, Countdown, Calibration
Hotkeys F1-F8 functional for scene switching
Transition duration <= 1300ms with smooth animation
No orphan sources in any master scene
CPU usage < 30% at 1440p60 encoding with x264 medium preset

stories.title: Vertical Canvas Scenes
stories.description: Create 5 vertical variants of master scenes for TikTok/Shorts/Reels at 1080x1920. Configure Vertical Canvas plugin for dual-canvas output.
acceptanceCriteria: 5 vertical scenes exist: Camera Only, Camera+Fret, Camera+Braid, Braid Only, Full Lesson
Vertical Canvas plugin configured at 1080x1920
Dual output functional (horizontal + vertical simultaneous)
Aspect ratio 9:16 verified for all vertical scenes

stories.title: Pedagogical Overlay System
stories.description: Migrate 220 image assets from Harry_Elgato with corrected Linux paths. Organize into toggleable groups, create interval overlay scene, create text prompt overlay scene.
acceptanceCriteria: All 220 image assets migrated to ~/.roxy/obs-portable/assets/
Path references updated from C:\Users\... to Linux paths
Interval group toggleable via Ctrl+I hotkey
COF overlays toggleable via Ctrl+O hotkey
OVERLAY_ASSET_MANIFEST.md lists all assets with categories

stories.title: Move Transition Animation System
stories.description: Port 102 move_source_filters for key transposition, create reusable animation presets, optimize simultaneous_move chains, add new animation types (zoom, fade, rotate).
acceptanceCriteria: Key shift animations functional for all 12 keys
Scale degree shift animations functional for 7 degrees
Default duration configurable (1300ms default)
All simultaneous_move chains from Harry_Elgato preserved
At least 3 new animation presets documented (zoom, fade, rotate)

stories.title: MIDI Integration Testing
stories.description: Test MIDI routing from guitar to NovaXe/8K Theater, verify KRONOS sync, test NDI widget latency, document MIDI setup with troubleshooting guide.
acceptanceCriteria: MIDI input from guitar detected in NovaXe FretboardWidget
Fretboard note highlighting latency < 50ms (measured)
Braid updates on chord detection within 100ms
KRONOS beat sync verified with metronome test
MIDI_INTEGRATION_GUIDE.md includes troubleshooting section

stories.title: Documentation & Onboarding
stories.description: Create quick start guide, document all hotkeys, create troubleshooting guide, update existing docs. Target < 5 minute read for quick start.
acceptanceCriteria: SKOREQ_DREAM_QUICKSTART.md word count < 1000 words
HOTKEY_REFERENCE.md lists all 30+ hotkeys with descriptions
TROUBLESHOOTING.md covers at least 10 common issues
At least 5 screenshots included in documentation
